text: Kris Jenner is reportedly unhappy with Kendall Jenner and A $ AP Rocky's relationship. The Kardashian matriarch was hoping her model daughter would date British heartthrob Harry Styles. The Victoria's Secret model and rapper, whose real name is Rakim Mayers, had showed off their relationship to the world at the 2017 Met Gala. A source told Hollywood Life : ` ` Kris doesn't understand why Kendall didn't take her relationship with Harry more seriously. She feels like Kendall threw in the towel too quickly and that if she had persevered, she and Harry would still be an item.'' ` ` Kris is disappointed that Harry is now off the market and dating Tess. Kris would much rather see her daughter with an A - list celeb like Harry, than A
